content.query:
-- DROP PROCEDURE parque_log

CREATE PROCEDURE parque_log @category VARCHAR(50),@name VARCHAR(50)
AS
BEGIN
    IF EXISTS (
                SELECT * FROM  [dbo].[parque_log]
            )
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[parque_log]
    GO

    IF NOT EXISTS (
            SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat'
        ) 
        CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
        WITH (
             FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
        )
    GO    
    
    IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'files_sayvnsdp20302_dfs_core_windows_net') 
        CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [files_sayvnsdp20302_dfs_core_windows_net] 
        WITH (
            LOCATION = 'abfss://files@sayvnsdp20302.dfs.core.windows.net' 
        )
    GO   

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[@name] 
    WITH(   
            LOCATION = 'parquet_modified/3',
            DATA_SOURCE = files_sayvnsdp20302_dfs_core_windows_net,
            FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat
            
    )AS
    SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://sayvnsdp20302.dfs.core.windows.net/files/parquet/Log.parquet',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        ) AS [result]
    WHERE STATUS = @category
END


-- EXEC parque_log @category='Succeeded',@name='parquelogs3'
